channel.title: Axoloti core downgrade from 2.0.0 to 1.0.12 problem
channel.description: Hi, I have a problem with uploading an older software version to axoloti core. Now I have version 2.0.0 and I want to roll back to version 1.0.12 and I have problems with it. Something hangs when uploading older version. Please help. Regards, Pomaranczo

item.title: Axoloti core downgrade from 2.0.0 to 1.0.12 problem
item.dc:creator: @orenpine Oren Pine
item.description:
@orenpine wrote:

I did this recently and had to use the 2.0 software to downgrade the board, is this what you've tried?

item.title: Axoloti core downgrade from 2.0.0 to 1.0.12 problem
item.dc:creator: @pomaranczo
item.description:
@pomaranczo wrote:

Hi,
I have a problem with uploading an older software version to axoloti core. Now I have version 2.0.0 and I want to roll back to version 1.0.12 and I have problems with it. Something hangs when uploading older version. Please help.

Regards, Pomaranczo

Zrzut ekranu 2020-09-7 o 07.49.02.png1916x1079 292 KB
